Class ArchiveDriverService

java.lang.Object
com.laoluade.ingestor.ao3.services.ArchiveDriverService
@Service public class ArchiveDriverService extends Object

This class is the Spring Boot service responsible for creating Selenium drivers.

This class uses the following settings from the application.properties file to configure itself:

  • archiveServer.driver.socket
  • archiveServer.driver.timeoutSecs

All archiveServer.driver settings have a class attribute counterpart.

    This attribute is the time in seconds

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CompletableFuture<org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver>
    createDriver()
    This method asynchronously attempts to create a Selenium driver.
    org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver
    obtainDriverOrNull()
    This method returns either a fresh RemoteWebDriver or null if the attempt to create a driver fails.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArchiveDriverService

      public ArchiveDriverService(ArchiveLogService logService, ArchiveMessageService messageService, @Value("${archiveServer.driver.socket}") String driverSocket, @Value("${archiveServer.driver.timeoutSecs}") long timeoutSecs)

      This constructor injects services and values into the archive driver service.

      Parameters:
      logService - The injected logging service.
      messageService - The injected message service.
      driverSocket - The injected driver socket value.
      timeoutSecs - The injected timeout seconds value.

  • Method Details

    • createDriver

      public CompletableFuture<org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver> createDriver()

      This method asynchronously attempts to create a Selenium driver.

      Returns:
      A completable future that possibly contains a RemoteWebDriver.

    • obtainDriverOrNull

      public org.openqa.selenium.remote.RemoteWebDriver obtainDriverOrNull()

      This method returns either a fresh RemoteWebDriver or null if the attempt to create a driver fails.

      Returns:
      Either a fresh RemoteWebDriver or null.
